specification.translation[0].definitions: a detailed instruction about how a car, building, piece of equipment etc should be made
The bolts met all the engineering specifications.
The airport building had been constructed to FAA specifications.
a clear statement of what is needed or wanted
job specification (=a detailed description of what a job involves)
a specification of what role each member will play
specification.translation[1].definitions: a detailed description of how something should be designed or made
the design specifications of the new computer system
Each machine is built to the highest specifications.
They delivered parts that did not conform with contract specifications (=were not made in the way the contract stated).
In defense electronics, components must meet rigid specifications set by the Pentagon.
if something is made, working etc to specification, it is doing so according to the description of how it should be designed
My job is to ensure that the plant is performing exactly to specification.
an official written description of something, giving details of what it is or what it involves
